        Parameters:

        projection - (if null return all columns)
        where - (if null return all rows)
        whereArgs - (allow null)
        groupBy - (allow null)

      • insert

        public int insert(java.lang.String table,
                  ColumnSet values,
                  boolean returnId)
           throws SQLException,
                  DatabaseException
        Execute a parameterized insert operation in database
        Parameters:
        table -
        values - (Can`t be null)
        returnId - (true if need to return the last inserted id or false for return the number affected rows)
        Returns:
        Return an integer with the number affected rows (if returnId is false) or last inserted id if is numeric(if returnId is true, if not numeric primary, return 0)
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.JSONException
        SQLException
        DatabaseException
